headline: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) Beats Q2 Sales Targets
summary: Industrial manufacturing company Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 4.6% year on year to $1.89 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.80 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Ingersoll (IR) Q2 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Ingersoll (IR) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Ingersoll Rand (IR) Q2 Earnings Meet Estimates
summary: Ingersoll (IR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0.00% and +2.47%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Ingersoll: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Davidson, North Carolina-based company said it had a loss of 29 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 80 cents per share. The results met Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Ingersoll: Q2 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Ingersoll Rand Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: DAVIDSON, N.C., July 31, 2025--Ingersoll Rand Inc. (NYSE: IR), a global provider of mission-critical flow creation and life science and industrial solutions, reported record second quarter 2025 orders, revenues, and adjusted EBITDA.

raw.headline: Ingersoll Rand Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
